title: Unable to install Truffle using npm
body:
- [ ] I've asked for help in the [Truffle Gitter](http://gitter.im/Consensys/truffle) before filing this issue.
Yes
---------------------------

## Issue

What the issue is, in broad strokes. unable to install truffle using npm

## Steps to Reproduce

Please provide the shortest amount of steps to reproduce your issue.

## Expected Behavior
Earlier I have 5.1.27 and then I installed 5.1.33 but when I uninstalled and tried to reinstall I am getting garbage messages

## Actual Results
loadDep:original-require  ▌ ╢██████████░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░╟

What actually happened. Please give examples and support it with screenshots, copied output or error messages.
I have copied above
## Environment
Ubuntu 18.04
* Operating System: Ubuntu 18.04
* Ethereum client: ganachi, npm 3.5.2
* Truffle version (`truffle version`):
* node version (`node --version`):
* npm version (`npm --version`): 
 truffle(ganache)> truffle version

    
    Solidity v0.5.16 (solc-js) Node v8.10.0 Web3.js v1.2.1

    truffle(ganache)>
Please help me as soon as possible, https://spectrum.chat/trufflesuite/truffle/unable-to-upgrade-truffle~6b51987e-1e0b-45ba-9996-7ae2f89a186e, zulfi6000@yahoo.com

@zak100 please update your node version to v10 if you can. This should resolve the issue, but let us know if that's not the case. I don't believe this is a bug with the Truffle code, so I'm going to go ahead and close this issue. Thanks!
